revision.comment: Changed datatype (string to wikibase item) of property value (P31 - instanceof)
New value for property P31 - instanceof
Changed datatype (string to time) + value for property P571 - inception
Change datatype (quantity to string) of property population (P1082)
Add property coordinate location (P625)+ change datatype of population (P1082)
Udpate value of population and lowerBound (P1082) and update calendar in inception (P571)
Initial creation of Barack Obama with description in multiple languages
Add country of citizenship (P27) and remove property country (P17)
Remove one of the values for country of citizenship (P27)
Change date of birth (P569) datatype (time to string)
